name: Cancer Aid Society

address: 4th Fl,Sunshine Court Phase 2, 66c PN Road, Hazratganj

briefDescription: Cancer Aid Society has the credit of being the only Non Profit, National Level, Social Secular NGO having ISO 9001: 2015 Certification,  duly registered under Societies Registration Act in 1987,  Income Tax U/s 80 G, Foreign Contribution Regulation Act. It is working for the control of Cancer in tune with the guidelines of the “National Cancer Control Programmes”, 1995 & 2002 of the World Health Organization and “National Cancer Control Programme”, 1985 & 2005 of the Govt. of India without getting any financial assistance from the Government or Non Government Bodies. As on date this NGO has the distinction of being the Pioneer and Leader in the various problems pertaining to Cancer and its Control across the Country through our National Network of Offices at Delhi, Mumbai, Chennai, Kolkata, Ahmedabad and Lucknow.  We are establishing a Day Care Centre the first one in the most populous State i.e. UP at Lucknow.

address: 2A, First Floor, Regency Avadh Complex, Chowk
